test-suite.name: ConnectionStringTests
test-suite.description: Test fixture which asserts that our RavenDB connection string parser behaves as expected for the defaults we show on the command-line

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Connectivity.ConnectionStringTests.Should_Accept_ConnectionString_with_Just_Url
test-case.description: Should accept a connection string that has just a Url in it

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Connectivity.ConnectionStringTests.Should_Accept_ConnectionString_with_Url_and_ApiKey
test-case.description: Should accept a connection string that has both a Url and an API key specified - typically used for RavenHQ

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Connectivity.ConnectionStringTests.Should_Accept_ConnectionString_with_Url_and_DefaultDatabase
test-case.description: Should accept a connection string that has both a url and a default database specified

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Connectivity.ConnectionStringTests.Should_Accept_ConnectionString_with_Url_and_UserNamePassword
test-case.description: Should be able to parse a connection string that has both a username and password in it in addition to the Url

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Connectivity.ConnectionStringTests.Should_Accept_ConnectionString_with_Url_UserNamePassword_and_DefaultDb
test-case.description: Should accept a connection sting that has a Url, a username / password, and a default database specified

test-suite.name: IndexJobManagerConnectivityTests
test-suite.description: Test fixture for asserting that our

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Connectivity.IndexJobManagerConnectivityTests.Should_Report_Successful_Connection_to_Embedded_Database
test-case.description: Should be able to establish and accurately report a connection to an embedded database

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Connectivity.IndexJobManagerConnectivityTests.Should_Report_Unsuccessful_Connection_to_Nonexistant_Database
test-case.description: Should report that the connection was unsuccessful to a database that does not exist

test-suite.name: IndexCreationTests
test-suite.description: Test fixture used for verifying that we can successfully create indexes using IndexBuilder

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Indexes.IndexCreationTests.Should_Find_Indexes_From_All_Assemblies
test-case.description: Should be able to produce a list of indexes gathered from all of the assemblies specified in the IndexBuilder constructor

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Indexes.IndexCreationTests.Should_Report_IndexCreationFailure_When_Building_Invalid_Index
test-case.description: We should be able to receive a failure notification back from RavenDb when we try to create an index that is invalid

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Indexes.IndexCreationTests.Should_Report_IndexCreationSuccess_When_Building_Valid_Index
test-case.description: We should recieve a success notification when we are able to successfully build an index against RavenDB

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Indexes.IndexCreationTests.Should_Report_Progress_on_Batch_Jobs
test-case.description: Should be able to report progress on batch jobs via the callback we pass in without any issues

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Indexes.IndexCreationTests.Should_Synchronously_Create_Indexes_Against_Embedded_Database
test-case.description: Should be able to build our valid RavenDB indexes against an in-memory test database

test-suite.name: AssemblyLoaderTests
test-suite.description: Test for validating that our path-checking methods behave as expected

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Runtime.AssemblyLoaderTests.Should_Extend_Relative_Path_to_Absolute_Path
test-case.description: Our GetFullAssemblyPath method should be able to translate a relative path into an absolute one

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Runtime.AssemblyLoaderTests.Should_Find_RavenDbIndexes_On_Assembly_with_Index_Definitions
test-case.description: Should be able to find RavenDb indexes on an assembly that is defined with them

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Runtime.AssemblyLoaderTests.Should_Load_Valid_Assembly
test-case.description: Should be able to load a valid assembly into memory at run-time

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Runtime.AssemblyLoaderTests.Should_Not_Find_Assembly_at_Bad_Path
test-case.description: Should get a false on our can-find assembly method for an assembly that does not exist

test-suite.name: IndexJobManagerAssemblyLoadTests
test-suite.description: Test fixture for asserting that our IndexJobManager can properly load and verify valid assemblies containing RavenDB index definitions

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Runtime.IndexJobManagerAssemblyLoadTests.Should_Report_Successful_Load_For_Valid_Assembly_Containing_RavenDB_Index_Definitions
test-case.description: Should report a successful load event for a valid assembly that actually has RavenDB index definitions

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Runtime.IndexJobManagerAssemblyLoadTests.Should_Report_Unsuccessful_Load_For_Assembly_with_No_Index_Definitions
test-case.description: Should report an unsuccessful load job when we attempt to load an assembly that exists, but has no index definitions

test-case.name: Hircine.Core.Tests.Runtime.IndexJobManagerAssemblyLoadTests.Should_Report_Unsuccessful_Load_For_NonExistant_Assembly
test-case.description: Should report an unsuccessful load job when we attempt to load an assembly that does not exist

test-suite.name: CommandLineParseTests
test-suite.description: Test fixture for ensuring that our

test-case.name: Hircine.Console.Tests.CommandLineParseTests.Should_Parse_Connection_String_and_Assembly
test-case.description: Should be able to handle a commandline that contains a single connection string and an assembly

test-case.name: Hircine.Console.Tests.CommandLineParseTests.Should_Parse_Connection_String_and_Assembly_With_SequentialFlags
test-case.description: Should be able to handle a commandline that contains a single connection string, an assembly, and some build flags

test-case.name: Hircine.Console.Tests.CommandLineParseTests.Should_Parse_Multiple_Connection_Strings_and_Assemblies
test-case.description: Should be able to handle a commandline that contains multiple connection strings and assemblies

test-case.name: Hircine.Console.Tests.CommandLineParseTests.Should_Parse_Successful_Options_for_Just_Assembly_and_EmbeddedDb
test-case.description: A simple commandline call with just an embed flag and a valid assembly name

test-case.name: Hircine.Console.Tests.CommandLineParseTests.Should_Parse_Successful_Options_for_Just_Show_Help
test-case.description: A simple commandline call with just the help flag set should passs
